definition: li, ancient measure of length, approx. 500 m/neighborhood/ancient administrative unit of 25 families/(Tw) borough, administrative unit between the township 鎮|镇[zhen4] and neighborhood 鄰|邻[lin2] levels

sentences.english: They sought refuge in the mountain villages .
sentences.chinese: 他们到山村里寻找避难所。

sentences.english: Although she's lived there for ten years, the villagers still treat her as an outsider.
sentences.chinese: 她虽然在那儿住了十年，村里人仍视她如外人。

sentences.english: New Year's Eve, an old man came into the village.
sentences.chinese: 一年除夕，一位老人来到村里乞讨食物。

sentences.english: In the old days the villages were clusters of mud huts surrounded by high mud walls.
sentences.chinese: 在旧社会，村里是高高的泥墙围成的棚屋丛。

sentences.english: In a village not far from here, a woman was cleaning rice.
sentences.chinese: 离此不远的村里，有位女人在舂米。

sentences.english: Shu ping and show jade notice hurried back to the village to hide the men in the village.
sentences.chinese: 淑萍和秀玉赶忙回村通知村里的男人躲起来。

sentences.english: We walked down the village street， where they were having market day.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着村里的大街向前走去，村民们正在那里赶集。

sentences.english: On one lunar New Year's Eve, an old man came into the village.
sentences.chinese: 一年除夕，一位老人来到村里乞讨食物。

sentences.english: He lives alone in a lonely mountain village, but he doesn't feel lonely .
sentences.chinese: 他独自一人住在一个偏僻的山村里，但并不觉得孤独。

sentences.english: The village rang with the joy of Christmas.
sentences.chinese: 村里洋溢著圣诞节的欢乐气氛。

sentences.english: The headman brought all the villagers home in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 傍晚，大臣带着村民返回村里。

sentences.english: Many firecrackers hanging on walls in the daytime ready to send the coffin up the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 发殡那天村里很多家门口都要挂上鞭炮送老人上山。

sentences.english: The villagers said that her mother is "crazy wife."
sentences.chinese: 村里人都说妈妈是“疯老婆”。

sentences.english: In the village there lived a simple, good man named Rip Van Winkle .
sentences.chinese: 村里住着一位简朴的好人，他的名字叫做李伯凡文克。

sentences.english: In 2006, the grown-up Lan Jinfeng decided to build a road.
sentences.chinese: 年，成长后的蓝锦锋决定带着村里人修路。

sentences.english: There are people coming down from the villages.
sentences.chinese: 也有人从山下的村里跑上来看病。

definition: neighbors/next-door neighbors/related work units/colleagues doing related work
branch secretary/secretary of a branch of the Communist Party or the Communist Youth League/abbr. for 支部書記|支部书记
fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
